pages.text: Collies were originally bred as herding and livestock guardian dogs.$(br2)Standing at roughly a block tall, these steadfast dogs come in four different coats.
These dogs are most commonly found in windswept biomes. They can also be found in plains, and more rarely in meadows.
pages.title: Location
Taming
pages.text: These dogs can be tamed with a Mutton Treat.
